languages.text: "Я не могу перевезти их в свое новое укрытие, так что забирай. Саркофаги для содержания опасных образцов разблокированы — обследуй их, возможно, кто-то из твоих слуг еще жив. Но не вздумай разрешать им использовать свои силы здесь, пока я не покинул Анатомическую оперу!"

"I cannot transport them to my new sanctuary. You may take them. I have unlocked the containment sarcophagi for dangerous specimens. Go and inspect them. Some of your servants may still be alive. But do not allow them to use their abilities until I have left the Anatomical Opera!"
languages.original_text: "Я не могу перевезти их в свое новое укрытие, так что забирай. Саркофаги для содержания опасных образцов разблокированы — обследуй их, возможно, кто-то из твоих слуг еще жив. Но не вздумай разрешать им использовать свои силы здесь, пока я не покинул Анатомическую оперу!"

traits.locale_text: "I cannot transport them to my new sanctuary. You may take them. Some might still be alive. But do not think about allowing them to use their abilities in here until I have departed from the Anatomical Opera!"

"I cannot transport them to my new sanctuary. You may take them. I have unlocked the containment sarcophagi for dangerous specimens. Go and inspect them. Some of your servants may still be alive. But do not allow them to use their abilities until I have left the Anatomical Opera!"
"I cannot transport them to my new sanctuary. You may take them. Some may still be alive. But do not allow them to use their abilities until I have left the Anatomical Opera!"
"I cannot transport them to my new sanctuary. You may take them. Some may still be alive. But do not allow them to use their abilities until I have left the Anatomical Opera!"
"I cannot transport them to my new sanctuary. You may take them. Some may still be alive. But do not allow them to use their abilities until I have left the Anatomical Opera!"

"I cannot transport them to my new sanctuary. You may take them. I have unlocked the containment sarcophagi for dangerous specimens. Go and inspect them. Some of your servants may still be alive. But do not allow them to use their abilities until I have left the Anatomical Opera!"

languages.text: « Je ne peux pas les emmener dans mon nouveau sanctuaire. Vous pouvez les avoir. J'ai déverrouillé le sarcophage qui renferme les spécimens dangereux. Allez donc y jeter un coup d'œil. Certains de vos serviteurs sont peut-être encore en vie. Mais attendez que je quitte l'Opéra anatomique avant de les laisser utiliser leurs compétences ! »
languages.original_text: "I cannot transport them to my new sanctuary. You may take them. I have unlocked the containment sarcophagi for dangerous specimens. Go and inspect them. Some of your servants may still be alive. But do not allow them to use their abilities until I have left the Anatomical Opera!"

traits.locale_text: « Je ne peux pas les emmener dans mon nouveau sanctuaire. Vous pouvez les avoir. J'ai déverrouillé le sarcophage qui renferme les spécimens dangereux. Allez donc y jeter un coup d'œil. Certains de vos serviteurs sont peut-être encore en vie. Mais attendez que je quitte l'Opéra anatomique avant de les laisser utiliser leurs compétences ! »

languages.text: “我没办法把他们运到我新的避难所里，你可以把他们都带走。我已经打开了收容危险实验样本的棺柩，你去检查一下吧，说不定有几个仆人还活着。不过，在我离开解剖歌剧院之前，不准让他们使用任何能力！”
languages.original_text: "I cannot transport them to my new sanctuary. You may take them. I have unlocked the containment sarcophagi for dangerous specimens. Go and inspect them. Some of your servants may still be alive. But do not allow them to use their abilities until I have left the Anatomical Opera!"

traits.locale_text: “我没办法把他们运到我新的避难所里，你可以把他们都带走。其中一部分人可能还活着。不过，在我离开解剖歌剧院之前，不要让他们使用能力！”

languages.text: "Ich kann sie nicht in meine neue Zuflucht bringen. Ihr könnt sie haben. Ich habe die Sarkophage für gefährliche Spezies entriegelt. Geht und seht sie Euch an. Einige Eurer Diener leben vielleicht noch. Aber gestattet ihnen nicht, ihre Fähigkeiten einzusetzen, bis ich die Anatomische Oper verlassen habe!"
languages.original_text: "I cannot transport them to my new sanctuary. You may take them. I have unlocked the containment sarcophagi for dangerous specimens. Go and inspect them. Some of your servants may still be alive. But do not allow them to use their abilities until I have left the Anatomical Opera!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann sie nicht in meine neue Zuflucht bringen. Ihr könnt sie haben. Manche leben vielleicht noch. Aber gestattet ihnen nicht, ihre Fähigkeiten einzusetzen, bis ich die Anatomische Oper verlassen habe!"

languages.text: «No puedo llevarlos a mi nuevo santuario. Llévatelos. He desbloqueado los sarcófagos de contención de especímenes peligrosos. Ve e inspecciónalos. Puede que algunos de tus sirvientes aún estén vivos. Pero ¡no les dejes usar sus habilidades hasta que me vaya de la Ópera Anatómica!».
languages.original_text: "I cannot transport them to my new sanctuary. You may take them. I have unlocked the containment sarcophagi for dangerous specimens. Go and inspect them. Some of your servants may still be alive. But do not allow them to use their abilities until I have left the Anatomical Opera!"

traits.locale_text: «No puedo llevarlos a mi nuevo santuario. Llévatelos. Puede que algunos aún estén vivos. Pero ¡no les dejes usar sus habilidades hasta que me vaya de la Ópera Anatómica!».

languages.text: 「私の新しい聖域に連れて行くことはできない。お前が連れて行け。危険な標本用を閉じ込めておくための棺を開けてやった。行って、調べてみるが良い。何人かのお前の使用人は、まだ生きているかもしれない。だが私がアナトミカル・オペラを去るまで、彼らに能力を使わせてはならないぞ！」
languages.original_text: "I cannot transport them to my new sanctuary. You may take them. I have unlocked the containment sarcophagi for dangerous specimens. Go and inspect them. Some of your servants may still be alive. But do not allow them to use their abilities until I have left the Anatomical Opera!"

traits.locale_text: 「私の新しい聖域に連れて行くことはできない。お前が連れて行け。何人かは、まだ生きているかもしれない。だが私がアナトミカル・オペラを去るまで、彼らに能力を使わせてはならないぞ！」

languages.text: "Onları yeni kutağıma nakledemem. Alabilirsin onları. Tehlikeli numuneler için kullanılan kısıltlayıcı lahdin kilidini açtım. Gidip onları incele. Hizmetkârlarının bir kısmı hâlâ hayatta olabilir ama ben Anatomi Operası'ndan ayrılmadan önce kabiliyetlerini kullanmalarına müsaade etme!"
languages.original_text: "I cannot transport them to my new sanctuary. You may take them. I have unlocked the containment sarcophagi for dangerous specimens. Go and inspect them. Some of your servants may still be alive. But do not allow them to use their abilities until I have left the Anatomical Opera!"

traits.locale_text: "Onları yeni kutağıma nakledemem. Alabilirsin onları. Tehlikeli numuneler için kullanılan kısıltlayıcı lahdin kilidini açtım. Gidip onları incele. Hizmetkârlarının bir kısmı hâlâ hayatta olabilir ama ben Anatomi Operası'ndan ayrılmadan önce kabiliyetlerini kullanmalarına müsaade etme!"
